    65	    Returns:
    66	        A tuple of three tensors: (losses, chosen_rewards, rejected_rewards).
    67	        The losses tensor contains the DPO loss for each example in the batch.
    68	        The chosen_rewards and rejected_rewards tensors contain the rewards for the chosen and rejected responses, respectively.
    69	    """
    70	# Compute DPO loss
    71	    chosen_rewards = policy_chosen_logps - reference_chosen_logps
    72	    rejected_rewards = policy_rejected_logps - reference_rejected_logps
    73	    delta = chosen_rewards - rejected_rewards
    74	    losses = -F.logsigmoid(beta * delta)
    75	    return losses, chosen_rewards, rejected_rewards
